projectGridLines.stationName: WILP - ACS & Cyber Security and Pentration Testing , Hyderabad
projectGridLines.title: Vehicle security penetration testing facility in collaboration with Bosch:
projectGridLines.description:
路         Students will be working on setting up the pen testing facility with Experts from Bosch.

路         Penetration testing, or pen testing, is a cybersecurity process where ethical hackers simulate attacks on a system, network, or application to identify vulnerabilities before malicious actors can exploit them. It involves stages like reconnaissance, vulnerability analysis, exploitation, and reporting, each designed to uncover weak points in security defences.

路         Projects will be based on network security, HAckerRF, Automotive security, Post-quantum cryptography, Hardware Security Modules, Side channel attack etc.

路         Preferable tools and skills:

CANoe, CANalyzer, Ghidra, IDA Pro, HackRF, Burp Suite, Nmap, quiskit (IBM)

In-vehicle communication protocols CAN, LIN, Ethernet, embedded systems programming (C/C++), firmware analysis, wireless communication security, cryptography, threat modelling, risk assessment, penetration testing, secure coding practices, and application security.
